text: AHHH THE SPIDER!!
GET AWAY MR. SPIDER!!
WOAH, WHAT’S WRONG CAROL?
SPIDERS ARE SO SCARY!
NO, THEY’RE NOT, THEY CAN’T HURT YOU!
THEY’RE ONLY LITTLE AND YOU’RE SOOOO MUCH BIGGER!
BUT THEY’RE SOOOO CREEPY!
NAH, THEY’RE FRIENDLY AND THEY ALWAYS GET BACK UP WHEN THEY FALL…..WATCH THIS…
Incy-Wincy Spider Climbed up the water spout
Down came the rain and washed the spider out
Out came the sun and dried up all the rain
And Incy-Wincy spider Climbed up the spout again
Incy-Wincy spider, Incy-Wincy spider
Incy climbing higher, Incy climbing higher…… HAHA!
HMMM, I DON’T KNOW.
HE STILL LOOKS A LITTLE SPOOKY TO ME!
NAAAAAAH!
HE’S JUST DOING HIS THING!
Incy-Wincy spider climbed up the barnyard door
Down came the rain and he fell on the floor
Out came the sun and dried up all the rain
And Incy-Wincy spider climbed up the door again
Incy-Wincy spider, Incy-Wincy spider
Incy climbing higher, Incy climbing higher…...
HEHEHE,
I GUESS HE’S KINDA CUTE!
HE SURE IS, AND HE JUST KEEPS ON CLIMBIN!!
Incy-Wincy spider climbed up the maple tree
Down came the rain and washed away Incy
Out came the sun and dried up all the rain
And Incy-Wincy spider climbed up the tree again
Incy-Wincy spider, Incy-Wincy spider
Incy climbing higher, Incy climbing higher…...
Incy-Wincy spider climbed up the water spout
Down came the rain and washed the spider out
Out came the sun and dried up all the rain
And Incy-Wincy spider climbed up the spout again
Incy-Wincy spider, Incy-Wincy spider
Incy climbing higher, Incy climbing higher……
YOU WERE RIGHT, NICO. SPIDERS ARE AWESOME!!
HAHAHA, THAT’S RIGHT! AND INCY IS MY VERY FAVOURITE 8-LEGGED FRIEND!
HAHAHAHAHA!
